title: Number of road deaths in Germany 2006 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of fatalities, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2011 to 2006.
But, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2018 to 2015.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2013.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2013 to 2011.
gold: This line graph shows the number of road traffic fatalities per year in Germany between 2006 and 2018 . In 2009 , 4,152 individuals were killed in motor vehicle accidents . An overall decrease in the number of road deaths was observed within the time period shown .
